content.text:
I don't have access to external tools or the ability to interact with systems outside of this conversation. Here's what I can actually do:

**Text-based capabilities:**
- Answer questions and explain concepts
- Write, edit, and analyze text
- Code (write, debug, explain in multiple languages)
- Summarize and research topics
- Brainstorm ideas
- Help with math and logic problems

**What I cannot do:**
- Browse the internet or access real-time information
- Run code or execute programs
- Access files, emails, or external systems
- Make API calls or integrate with other services
- See images, videos, or documents (unless you share their content with me)
- Remember previous conversations (each chat starts fresh)

**Limitations:**
- My knowledge has a cutoff date (April 2024)
- I can make mistakes
- I can't learn or update from our conversation

Is there something specific you're trying to accomplish? I might be able to help you think through it or suggest alternatives.
